TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Entropy extends System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.ProtectedKey

summary.span: Representa a entropia usada tanto em mensagens de solicitação de token quanto em mensagens de resposta de token.

span.span: Represents the entropy used in both token request messages and token response messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Representa o conteúdo do elemento wst:Entropy definido pelo WS-Trust.Represents the contents of the wst:Entropy element defined by WS-Trust.
